name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feminist News Feed Eradicator for Facebook

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find yourself spending too much time on Facebook? Eradicate distractions by replacing your entire news feed with an empowering quote

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A feminist twist on the original News Feed Eradicator by @jordanwest.
